Title: ROW_NUMBER()
Description: ROW_NUMBER() 返回结果集中当前行的行号。

WITH RECURSIVE cte(n) AS (
    SELECT
        1
    UNION
    SELECT
        n+3
    FROM
        cte
    WHERE
        n<30
)
SELECT
    n,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER ()
FROM
    cte;
Examples:
WITH RECURSIVE cte(n) AS (
    SELECT
        1
    UNION
    SELECT
        n+3
    FROM
        cte
    WHERE
        n<30
)
SELECT
    n,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER ()
FROM
    cte;
